item.description:
Machievelli's is a decent spot in Southington. You got a 2 sided bar area in the middle along with a medium/small dance floor that compliments the DJ that spins on Friday Nights. He's been pretty good the times that i've been there lately. Machievelli's is in the Center of Southington where's there's plenty of others bars.

Southington is a great location. It's basically right in the center of the map of CT. So it's not that far to drive from Hartford (20 min), New Haven (30 min), and Waterbury (10 min).

See you Next Friday (April 29) at Machs in Downtown Southington!

 

It's gonna be a good time,

Christian
item.why: We're too freakin' Awesome not to!!! Also i don't know the last time we had a Southington Night Out.
item.name: Bar Night @ Downtown Southington
